translations.Component.ConfirmBeforeSubmit.ArchiveFee: Note that once archived, the feedZback will be removed from your history.
Note that once archived, the feedZback request will be removed from your history.
translations.Component.ConfirmBeforeSubmit.SendFeedba: Note that once your feedZback has been sent, it cannot be modified.
Note that once your feedZback request has been sent, it cannot be modified.
translations.Component.GiveFeedback.ApplyDraftContent: If you apply the draft, the feedZback you've started will be lost.
translations.Component.GiveFeedback.Share: Share feedback with your colleague's manager
translations.Component.GiveFeedback.ShareFeedbackMess: By sharing your feedZback, your colleague and his or her manager will be able to discuss it together and make the most of its content.
translations.Component.GiveFeedbackDetails.ContextPla: In what context did you work with your colleague?
translations.Component.GiveFeedbackSuccess.Title: FeedZback sent to:
translations.Component.GiveRequestedFeedback.Message1: This request was sent to you by:
translations.Component.GiveRequestedFeedback.Message2: Note that your feedback will be shared with his manager.
translations.Component.GiveRequestedFeedback.RestoreC: We have found unsaved changes in your local storage.
translations.Component.GiveRequestedFeedback.ShareFee: The recipient of the feedZback and his or her manager will be able to discuss it together and make the most of its content.
translations.Component.GiveRequestedFeedbackListEmpty: You haven't received any feedZback requests...
Take this opportunity to request or give feedZback to your colleagues!
translations.Component.Guide.Tip: To be constructive, feedback should focus on your colleague's work and behavior, not on his or her personality.
translations.Component.Menu.Title: Preferences & settings
translations.Component.NegativeFeedbackGuide.Step1_De: Describe {$START_TAG_STRONG}the facts{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} as neutrally as possible.
translations.Component.NegativeFeedbackGuide.Step1_Ex: You can be stuck on a task for days without informing your colleagues.
translations.Component.NegativeFeedbackGuide.Step2_De: Identify {$START_TAG_STRONG}the negative effects{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} produced in concrete terms and as you have perceived them.
translations.Component.NegativeFeedbackGuide.Step2_Ex: This can delay progress on the project and create tension in the team.
translations.Component.NegativeFeedbackGuide.Step3_De: Suggest {$START_TAG_STRONG}areas for improvement{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} that will benefit your colleague.
translations.Component.NegativeFeedbackGuide.Step3_Ex: Don't be afraid to ask your colleagues for help, because that doesn't take anything away from your qualities.
translations.Component.PendingFeedback.CanNotBeCancel: The request is recent (less than {$INTERPOLATION} days) and cannot yet be archived
translations.Component.PendingFeedback.ReminderAlread: You have sent a reminder to your colleague on
translations.Component.PendingFeedback.ReminderSent: A reminder has been sent to your colleague.
translations.Component.PendingFeedback.RequestArchive: The feedZback request has been archived.
translations.Component.PositiveFeedbackGuide.Step1_De: Describe {$START_TAG_STRONG}the facts{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} as neutrally as possible.
translations.Component.PositiveFeedbackGuide.Step1_Ex: Your colleagues regularly ask you questions, and you take the time to answer them.
translations.Component.PositiveFeedbackGuide.Step2_De: Identify {$START_TAG_STRONG}the positive effects{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} produced in concrete terms and as you have perceived them.
translations.Component.PositiveFeedbackGuide.Step2_Ex: The team never stays stuck for long, and has gained in confidence.
translations.Component.PositiveFeedbackGuide.Step3_De: {$START_TAG_STRONG}Highlight{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} your colleague's strengths, behavior and achievements.
translations.Component.PositiveFeedbackGuide.Step3_Ex: Your patience and ability to listen contribute to the team's cohesion.
translations.Component.PreRequestFeedback.RecipientAl: An email has already been sent to this address. Please check your inbox or try again with a different address.
translations.Component.PreRequestFeedback.RecipientFo: You cannot reply to your own feedZback request.
translations.Component.PreRequestFeedback.Requirement: Please enter and validate {$START_TAG_STRONG}your email address{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG}.
translations.Component.PreRequestFeedback.TokenInvali: The magic link is invalid or has been deleted.
translations.Component.PreRequestFeedback.TokenMaxUse: The magic link usage limit has been reached.
translations.Component.PreRequestFeedbackSuccess.Mess: It contains {$START_TAG_STRONG}a secure link{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} allowing you to provide your feedZback.
translations.Component.PreRequestFeedbackSuccess.Titl: We just sent you an email to the address:
translations.Component.RequestFeedback.GenerateRequir: For security reasons, the magic link is valid for {$START_TAG_STRONG}{$INTERPOLATION} days{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG} and can be used up to {$START_TAG_STRONG}{$INTERPOLATION_1} times{$CLOSE_TAG_STRONG}.
translations.Component.RequestFeedback.SendRequiremen: Use your colleagues' individual email addresses (avoid mailing lists).
translations.Component.RequestFeedback.SentError: An error occurred when sending to:
translations.Component.RequestFeedback.SentSuccess: Your request has been sent to:
translations.Component.RequestFeedback.ShareFeedbackM: By sharing the feedZback with your manager, you'll be able to discuss it together and make the most of its content. Note that the request message is part of the feedZback and will therefore be visible to your manager.
translations.Component.RequestFeedback.Template.Annua:
Hello,
With my annual review coming up, I'd like your feedback on what I'm doing well and what I could do better.
Thank you in advance.
translations.Component.RequestFeedback.Template.Confe:
Hello,
I recently gave a talk which you attended and I'd like your feedback on what went well and what I could do better.
Thank you in advance.
translations.Component.RequestFeedback.Template.EndOf:
Hello,
As you know, my assignment is coming to an end soon and I'd like your feedback on what I've done well and what I could do better.
Thank you in advance.
translations.Component.RequestFeedback.Template.Start:
Hello,
It's been a while since I started my assignment and I'd like your feedback on what I'm doing well and what I could do better.
Thank you in advance.

Hello,
If you have a few minutes, I'd like your feedback on my start at Zenika.
It could be something positive you've noticed or something I could do better.
Thank you in advance.
translations.Component.RequestFeedbackSuccess.Generat: Magic link to share with your colleagues:
translations.Component.SessionWarning.Message: Your session has been idle for {$INTERPOLATION}.{$LINE_BREAK} Automatic logout imminent...
translations.Component.Settings.ManagerEmailInfo: If this information is incorrect, don't worry! It is provided by your Google account, which may take a few days to update. FeedZback syncs with your Google account every time you log in to the app.
translations.Component.Settings.ManagerEmailUndefined: You do not have a manager defined in the app.
translations.Message.FeedbackIsSharedWithTheManagerOf: This feedZback is shared with the manager of your colleague
translations.Message.FeedbackIsSharedWithYourManager: This feedZback is shared with your manager

translations.Title.AppTagline: Sharing with kindness to value, progress and grow together.
translations.Title.AppTitle: Request and give feedback to your colleagues
